jd:
From: HASEENA, UNICORN TECHNOLOGIES LLC haseena@unicorntek.com Reply to: haseena@unicorntek.com NextGen Business Analyst

Location : REMOTE

Responsibilities
The BA serves as the communication catalysts, ensuring that agency business stakeholders and NextGen solution teams are in sync. The BA will serve as a facilitator to resolve business process issues and successfully deliver established project schedules and closing timelines.

Job Duties
At the direction of the Project Manager the BA will:
- Establish Stakeholder Register
- Assisting in scheduling and facilitating agency project meetings
- Assist stakeholders take the necessary actions/steps to achieve the goals and objectives of the project.
- Assists in coordinating project activities
- Assists in developing test plans
- Assists stakeholders with test scripts
- Documents and distributes meeting minutes
- Identifies and defines business requirements by quickly understanding business process requirements based on the input and opinions of a diverse group of users
- Works closely with Project manager to maintain project artifacts
- Develops and maintains a productive working relationship with project sponsors, vendors, and key clients.
- Documents agency business requirements in a suitable format that communicates the specific actions developed for the product and obtains appropriate approvals.

Qualifications
- Bachelor’s Degree
- 7 years’ working as a BA or 3 years’ BA experience and a BA certification
- Expert in the use of MS O365 applications
- Strong interpersonal and written communication skills
- Ability to work well with business unit SMEs, other PMs/BAs, vendors, and end users in cross-functional teams
- Possesses a broad understanding of IT and business skills
- Extremely detail-oriented, organized, structured, analytical, and logical, with strong problem-solving skills.
- Experience working with government organizations
